an4.109:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of tree.
an4.109:4.3: ~One is a softwood surrounded by softwood, ~one is a softwood surrounded by hardwood, ~one is a hardwood surrounded by softwood, and ~one is a hardwood surrounded by hardwood.
an4.109:4.4: These are the four kinds of tree.
an4.109:4.5: In the same way, these four people similar to trees are found in the world.
an4.109:4.7: ~One is a softwood surrounded by softwood, ~one is a softwood surrounded by hardwood, ~one is a hardwood surrounded by softwood, and ~one is a hardwood surrounded by hardwood.
an4.109:5.1: And how is a person a softwood surrounded by softwoods?
an4.109:5.2: It’s when a person is unethical, of bad character,
an4.109:5.3: and their following is the same.
an4.109:5.4: That’s how a person is a softwood surrounded by softwoods.
an4.109:5.5: That person is like a softwood tree that’s surrounded by softwoods, I say.
an4.109:6.1: And how is a person a softwood surrounded by hardwoods?
an4.109:6.2: It’s when a person is unethical, of bad character,
an4.109:6.3: but their following is ethical, of good character. …
an4.109:7.1: And how is a person a hardwood surrounded by softwoods?
an4.109:7.2: It’s when someone is ethical, of good qualities.
an4.109:7.3: but their following is unethical, of bad character. …
an4.109:8.1: And how is a person a hardwood surrounded by hardwoods?
an4.109:8.2: It’s when someone is ethical, of good qualities,
an4.109:8.3: and their following is the same.
an4.109:8.7: These four people similar to trees are found in the world.”
